sentences.en: "The most important thing about this particular individual is that she has a relatively large pelvis compared to other individuals of the same pterosaur, Darwinopterus," explained Dr Unwin.
sentences.cn: 这一达尔文翼龙个体跟其他个体最重要的区别是她有很大的盆骨。 Unwin博士指出。

sentences.en: As it is a pterosaur fossil found in Huanjiang, it is known as " pterosaur. "
sentences.cn: 因这具翼龙化石发现于环江, 故取名为 “ 环江翼龙 ”.

sentences.en: OK, so we’ve got a very large alligator with the wings of a pterosaur that can repel musket fire.
sentences.cn: 好了，那么我们有了个拥有翼龙翅膀的超大鳄鱼，还能抵挡住火枪的火力。

sentences.en: Pteranodon was a large Pterosaur, notable for its skull crest.
sentences.cn: 无齿翼龙是一种体形庞大的翼龙, 因其头上长有冠而别具一格.

sentences.en: See purple - red sandstone layers in the fossil pieces retained, Dong initially that this is pterosaur fossil.
sentences.cn: 看到那层紫红色砂岩中留存的化石残片, 董枝明初步认定这是翼龙化石.

sentences.en: This is huge for a pterosaur.
sentences.cn: 这对翼龙来说非常巨大。

trans.tran_en: any extinct flying reptile of the order Pterosauria, of Jurassic and Cretaceous times: included the pterodactyls
